text:
I think in first at the Montessori concept. Is an education concept wich will be the children choose her or his activities for learn. Is possible to see this education method in class with teacher for example. In this method the child is responsably and autonome in her learn. The role of the teacher is to make in classroom the necessary of pedagogy game, for the children. The child play during all the day. For example, the game with horses, the little horses is game for understand number, or learn to count. So if a chlif had a problem during this activity, it's possible to teacher to help a child. The child say what is good for his, and say that it's possible to learn having fun all of discipline.
 For me, this education method is a good alternative for top down learning. She permitted at a child with trouble of comportement to play and to learn. Because is really difficult for a child with this problem to be in chair during all one day, he need to movement for make in place concentration. And I think the game is a distraction so for a child to had difficulties for example in mathematics. It's possible to make in place the game with little horses for learning to count in heart. This alternative is funny, and permet at a child more and more stressed in front of an exercice in papel to relaxes and to learn also in front of a game.
